channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Avenger
channel.description:
Role name: The Avenger
Alignment: Neutral
Goal: Fulfill the wishes of the dead (Have a target chosen by the dead executed)
Abilities: An avenger in play will create a vote every night for dead chat on who should be executed the next day. The Avengers goal is to have a person executed that was voted for the night prior.
Passive: Can see Dead chat in the daytime but only the daytime. Immune to all forms of death and occupancy for the first 2 nights of it's existence.
Day ability (Necrodemocracy): Allow a member of the dead chat of the Avengers choosing to partake in the days voting. (Infinite)
Night ability (Calling card): Send a warning to tommorow's target and another player of your choosing (If chosen player is voted for it will be random) (Infinite)
Night Ability (Hush): One player who voted for you yesterday will be unable to use vowels in their speech next turn. (1)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Avenger
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I have an idea for a slightly different twist on this idea

Role: Avenger (Neutral Wildcard)
Goal: Get revenge for a killed player
Convert role: Convert immune

Abilities: Day - Avenge: Select a dead player to seek justice for. You must ensure that player’s killer is executed [Killer is defined as any role that killed them at night or the person who performed their execution]. If the player’s killer dies through any other means, you may select a new target. (Unlimited use).

Night: - Frame: Plant evidence on a player to make them look evil (Will look like unseen to sheriff, Killing class to Princess, Cult/Unseen to Psychic](3 uses)
Investigate: Check a player to see if they were guilty of killing your target (Infinite uses)

Read full topic
